text: Now who is distinguishing you? Or what do you have that you did not receive?Here is the fundamental recipe against boasting. None of us chose who our parents would be, where we would be born, what language would be our native tongue. But these circumstances dictate the opportunities that a person will have, quite apart from talents and abilities. Things that were given to us do not form a proper basis for boasting. So if you did indeed receive it, why do you boast as though you did not?
